from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT
                        NSIPDocumentId
                        ,documentId
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseRef as caseReference
                        ,documentReference
                        ,examinationRefNo
                        ,version
                        ,filename
                        ,originalFilename
                        ,size
                        ,mime
                        ,documentURI
                        ,publishedDocumentURI
                        ,path
                        ,virusCheckStatus
                        ,fileMD5
                        ,dateCreated
                        ,datePublished
                        ,lastModified
                        ,caseType
                        ,redactedStatus
                        ,publishedStatus
                        ,documentType
                        ,securityClassification
                        ,sourceSystem
                        ,origin
                        ,owner
                        ,author
                        ,NULL as authorWelsh
                        ,representative
                        ,description
                        ,NULL as descriptionWelsh
                        ,documentCaseStage
                        ,horizonFolderId
                        ,filter1
                        ,filter1Welsh
                        ,filter2
                        ,transcriptId
                        
                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,SourceSystemID
                        ,IngestionDate 
                        ,NULLIF(ValidTo, '') AS ValidTo
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,IsActive
                        
                    FROM 
                        {service_bus_table}

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT DISTINCT 
                    CAST(NULL AS LONG) AS NSIPDocumentId
                    ,Doc.dataId as documentid
                    ,CAST(Doc.casenodeid AS INTEGER) AS caseId
                    ,Doc.caseReference
                    ,Doc.documentReference
                    ,Aie.examinationRefNo
                    ,CAST(Doc.version AS INTEGER) AS version
                    ,name  as filename
                    ,name  as originalFilename
                    ,CAST(Doc.dataSize AS INTEGER) AS size
                    ,Aie.mime
                    ,Aie.documentURI
                    ,Aie.documentURI AS publishedDocumentURI
                    ,Aie.path
                    ,Doc.virusCheckStatus
                    ,Aie.fileMD5
                    ,Doc.createDate as dateCreated
                    ,Doc.datePublished
                    ,Doc.modifyDate as lastModified
                    ,Doc.caseworkType as caseType
                    ,Aie.redactedStatus as redactedStatus
                    ,Doc.documentType
                    ,Aie.securityClassification
                    ,Doc.sourceSystem -- set to horizon
                    ,Aie.origin AS origin
                    ,Aie.owner
                    ,Aie.author
                    ,NULL as authorWelsh
                    ,Doc.representative
                    ,Doc.documentDescription AS description
                    ,NULL as descriptionWelsh
                    ,Doc.documentCaseStage
                    ,Doc.parentid AS horizonFolderId
                    ,Doc.filter1
                    ,NULL AS filter1Welsh
                    ,Doc.filter2
                    ,Null as transcriptId
               
                    ,Doc.publishedStatus

                    ,"0" as Migrated
                    ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                    ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                    , to_timestamp(Doc.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                    ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                    ,'' as RowID
                    ,'Y' as IsActive
                FROM
                    {horizon_table} AS Doc
                LEFT JOIN {aie_extracts_table} AS Aie ON Doc.dataid = Aie.DocumentId
                WHERE
                    Doc.ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table})
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_appeal_document_calculations_base
        AS
        SELECT  
            row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY documentId ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
            ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, documentId asc) AS NSIPDocumentId
            ,documentId
            ,IngestionDate
            ,ValidTo
            ,'0' AS Migrated
            ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY documentId ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
                WHEN 1 THEN
                    'Y'
                ELSE
                    'N'
            END AS IsActive                
        FROM
            {spark_table_final}

df_calcs = spark.sql(f"""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPDocumentId
                            ,CurrentRow.documentId 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.documentId IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_appeal_document_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_appeal_document_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.documentId = NextRow.documentId
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT documentId FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_nsip_document) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.documentId = Raw.documentId 
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT NSIPDocumentId
                        ,documentId
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,documentReference
                        ,version
                        ,examinationRefNo
                        ,filename
                        ,originalFilename
                        ,size
                        ,mime
                        ,documentURI
                        ,publishedDocumentURI
                        ,path
                        ,virusCheckStatus
                        ,fileMD5
                        ,dateCreated
                        ,datePublished
                        ,lastModified
                        ,caseType
                        ,redactedStatus
                        ,publishedStatus
                        ,documentType
                        ,securityClassification
                        ,sourceSystem
                        ,origin
                        ,owner
                        ,author
                        ,authorWelsh
                        ,description
                        ,descriptionWelsh
                        ,documentCaseStage
                        ,filter1
                        ,filter1Welsh
                        ,filter2
                        ,horizonFolderId
                        ,transcriptId	
                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                IFNULL(CAST(NSIPDocumentId AS bigint), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(documentId AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(caseId AS integer), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(version AS integer), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(examinationRefNo AS integer), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(filename AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(originalFilename AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(size AS integer), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(mime AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(documentURI AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(publishedDocumentURI AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(path AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(virusCheckStatus AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(fileMD5 AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(dateCreated AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(datePublished AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(lastModified AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(caseType AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(redactedStatus AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(documentType AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(securityClassification AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(sourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(origin AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(owner AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(author AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(authorWelsh AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(description AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(descriptionWelsh AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(documentCaseStage AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(filter1 AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(filter1Welsh AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(filter2 AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(horizonFolderId AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(transcriptId AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(publishedStatus AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
                    FROM 
                        {spark_table_final}
                """)
